articles.author: The Bridge Desk
articles.title: AFC U-17 Asian Cup: Japan humiliates India U-17, eliminates from the group stages - The Bridge
articles.description: India U-17 faced a devastating 4-8 defeat against a dominant Japanese side, leading to their elimination from the AFC U-17 Asia Cup.
articles.content:
In a high-scoring encounter, India U-17 faced a devastating defeat against a dominant Japanese side, leading to their elimination from the AFC U-17 Asian Cup.
The first half was a dismal affair for … [+2215 chars]
